segments.text: What forms should I fill out to collect unemployment ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You need to fill out a special form to apply for unemployment benefits .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Where do I get the application form for unemployment benefits ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can call the Employment Development Office and request a form .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What information will I need to provide to apply for unemployment ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Be prepared to provide your employer â€™ s name and address and what dates you worked .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What else will the Employment Development Office need ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You need to be prepared to show that your unemployment is not your fault . If you have a termination notice , that would be great .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The Employment Development Office will call you for an interview .
segments.speaker: S2
